title: Write an Obituary
description: A prominent community member has passed away. A reporter must write a respectful and comprehensive obituary.

tasks.description: Gather key biographical details: date of birth, date of death, education, career, and family members.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles all the necessary factual information.

tasks.description: Contact a family member or close friend to get personal anecdotes and quotes about the deceased.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers personal stories that add color and humanity to the obituary.

tasks.description: Draft the obituary, combining the biographical facts with the personal remembrances in a respectful tone.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a well-structured and sensitive obituary.
